Emby FFMPEG Fixer v1.0.2

INSTALLATION:
1. Drag the Emby FFMPEG Fixer app to the Applications folder.
2. Launch from Applications.

UNINSTALLATION:
1. Run the uninstall.sh script in the Uninstaller folder.
2. Follow prompts to restore original FFMPEG binaries and remove all traces of this tool.

For support, visit: https://github.com/<your-github-username>/EmbyFFMPEGFixer
